jobDescription: PATIENT SUPPORT LEADPosition Summary:Global Blood Therapeutics is seeking a seasoned leader to oversee our Commercial Patient Support Program. The Patient Support Lead will report to the VP of Commercial Planning. The successful candidate will work across the organization in this highly visible position to design and manage Voxelotors US commercial patient support. The successful candidate must be able to operate in a fast-paced organization, with high expectations and accountability on quality and timing of the deliverables.The Patient Support Lead will operationalize Voxelotors US commercial patient support program by aligning with GBT values, assessing patient support needs, defining objectives and measurements, and executing programs, including reimbursement hub, co-pay, and any additional support programs. This individual also will be responsible for sourcing and managing vendor contracts, and overseeing project budgets. She/He will work closely with several departments including but not limited to US Marketing, Sales, Market Access, Commercial Operations, Community Engagement & Partnership, Regulatory, Legal, Compliance, and external customers. Candidates must have the proven ability to provide strategic leadership, vision and direction within a fast moving, challenging and energetic corporate environment. It is critical that candidate understand how to leverage and optimize partnerships with other functions including marketing, sales, market access, community engagement and partnership, legal, and regulatory.
